title: Wide Receiver Draft with Phoebe Schecter
itunes:title: Wide Receiver Draft with Phoebe Schecter
description:
A virtual room filled with some heroes - Dan Hanzus and Gregg Rosenthal bring you all of the latest news in the NFL starting with Jadeveon Clowney re-signing with the Cleveland Browns (7:30). Greg Olsen has officially been awarded the number one FOX Sports NFL broadcasting role (15:30). Nick Foles has signed a two-year deal with the Colts, and Carson Wentz responded to Jim Irsay calling the Wentz trade a "mistake" (21:30). After that, Phoebe Schecter joins the program (33:30) to participate in a 5-round wide receiver draft with the goal of building the most complete, complementary wide receiver room, with a surprise twist: mystery categories! Tune in to find out who drafted the best team, and let us know your thoughts in our Instagram poll @theatnpodcast.

Note: timecodes approximate.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
